reviews.review_text:
My recent dining experience at Olive Bar and Kitchen in Goa was nothing short of exceptional. This stylish restaurant is a must-visit destination for foodies and anyone seeking a sophisticated dining experience.
The ambiance at Olive Bar and Kitchen is chic and elegant, with a warm and inviting atmosphere. The beautifully designed interior, complete with comfortable seating and soft lighting, sets the tone for a memorable dining experience.
The cuisine at Olive Bar and Kitchen is truly exceptional, with a focus on Mediterranean and international flavors. The menu is diverse and innovative, with dishes that are both familiar and excitingly new. Each bite was a masterclass in flavor and technique.
The service at Olive Bar and Kitchen was impeccable, with friendly and attentive staff who were knowledgeable about the menu and happy to make recommendations.
Considering the exceptional quality of the cuisine, ambiance, and service, Olive Bar and Kitchen offers outstanding value for money.
My dining experience at Olive Bar and Kitchen was truly unforgettable. If you're looking for a sophisticated and delicious meal in Goa, look no further. I highly recommend it!

A beautiful place that came with an ocean view, a courteous staff, lovely ambiance, and a well curated menu. Unfortunately, I fail to recall the names of our cocktails or of the food but I do know that they were extremely delicious and that we had a great time consuming them. As the night wore on, a local band serenaded us with some lovely songs. It was a perfect place to enjoy a lovely evening.

Lovely space and courteous hosts. We ordered the calamari 3 ways, (highly recommended), the non vegetarian mezze board, and the seafood skewers platter. All dishes were superb. One could see that choicest ingredients were used.
My mom, who was fasting, ordered the milkshake, which was prepared to her liking along with some French fries. It was a nice place to spend the evening with friends and family over shared plates.
Recommended :)
